AdriaArray - Working Groups¶

Working Group 1 ‘Station siting’¶

  • Initial contact: P. Kolínský.

Working Group 2 ‘Technical advice’¶

  • Station installation, data flow & telemetry.

  • Initial contact: C. Neagoe.

Working Group 3 ‘Data QC’¶

  • Initial contact: A. Schlömer, L. Vecsey, J. Stampa, M. Timko, F. Eckel.

Working Group 4 ‘Communication and Outreach’¶

  • Initial contact: C. Cauzzi & C. Legendre.

Working Group 5 ‘Scientific Co-operation’¶

  • Initial contact: T. Meier.

Working Group 6 ‘Early Career Scientists’¶

  • Initial contact: C. Estève.

Technical documents¶

  • The Memorandum of Collaboration (MoC) is available.

  • A list of seismic network codes is available at the FDSN.

  • Station lists will be available via the FDSN and via EIDA.

  • Best practice for field work, data management and QC of temporary deployments.

  • Station names and network codes.
